hasAttributes.name: ContractId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

hasAttributes.name: ContractSignedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date that the Contract was signed.

hasAttributes.name: ContractEffectiveStartDate
hasAttributes.description: The date that the Contract goes into effect.

hasAttributes.name: ContractEffectiveEndDate
hasAttributes.description: The date that the Contract is terminated or expires.

hasAttributes.name: ContractPeriodMonths
hasAttributes.description: The number of months that the contract is to be in effect.

hasAttributes.name: AutomaticRenewalIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates that the Contract is to be automatically renewed upon expiration.

hasAttributes.name: ContractTypeId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Contract Type.

definitions.description: A written agreement between two or more parties specifying the terms and conditions under which business obligations will be performed.
